name: Tic Tac Toe With Themes
description:
As we all know that tic tac toe is one of the least time consuming board game which is used to play between two players by putting cross (X) or nought (O) in the respective blocks of the board.

One of the two players who fills the three consecutive blocks (along the length, along the breadth or along the diagonal of the board) first, then he/she wins the game.

This updated version of the game is provided with two different modes (one player and two players' mode).

In one player mode (user vs. computer or AI), there are three different levels (easy, medium and hard).

Hard level (in one player mode) is quite challenging and interesting, in which it is impossible to defeat the computer, you can only lose or at most draw against the computer as it is almost impossible to win.

In two players' mode, one player (or user1) plays against the another player (or user2).
